name: MpiExec Lolbin
description: Detects a certain command line flag combination used by mpiexec.exe LOLBIN from HPC pack that can be used to execute any other binary
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\mpiexec.exe OR process.pe.imphash:d8b52ef6aaa3a81501bdfff9dbb96217 OR related.hash:*IMPHASH\=d8b52ef6aaa3a81501bdfff9dbb96217*) AND process.command_line:(*\ \/n\ 1\ * OR *\ \-n\ 1\ *))`
